resources.string: So, we will be talking about titles. Just the word \'title\' in different languages, to be exact. \n \nIn Indonesian, title is Judul. How you read it is like joodool. Kurang lebih. Next, in Korean title is 표제 or you read it like pyonjae. In German, Titel is title, you read it like title but with so much German pronunciation. If you want to know title in more languages, you can open www.translate.google.com.
